alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Haywood; Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 1:32PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Tipton, northwestern Fayette, southwestern Lauderdale and southwestern Haywood Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 132 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Munford, or 8 miles south of Fort Pillow State Park, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Munford, Brighton, Fulton, Tipton, Atoka, Mason, Gallaway, Gilt Edge, Stanton, Burlison, Garland, Braden, Egypt, Belmont, Quito, Turnpike, Idaville, Beaver and Randolph. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
